/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and buses, painted in shades of white, blue, and red, traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, with shadows subtly hinting at the time of day.
